name: sObjectField

methods.name: getDescribe
methods.description: Returns the describe field result for this field.

methods.name: getDescribe
methods.description: Returns the describe field result for this field. This method also provides an option to get all the describe field results for an object.

params.name: options
params.description: Use this parameter to pass FieldDescribeOptions.FULL_DESCRIBE when a subset of system objects could have different results for picklist values based on the context they're invoked in. This parameter computes all aspects of describe field results. For example, AIConversationContext.PersonType field is a picklist that contains a list of accessible object types.

description: A Schema.sObjectField object is returned from the field describe result using the getControler and getSObjectField methods.
